post.body: I love your web site design and the copy scatter gizmo you have on your text. Your portfolio of site designs look great, too
The unfortunate thing was as soon as I was pulling it out of the fridge, he changed his mind...oh well. Maybe next time.
Yup. I've been at Estes Park Realty with Mike and Robby since the beginning. April 2006 to be exact.
was the cabin at the YMCA? Do you come to Estes Park often?
Thanks for the Follow Paul. Nice to see a fellow Estes park resident on Twitter!
Anything wearing shorts sounds like a great time right about now. Winds have been killler last couple of weeks. Happy New Year
welcome back. That was quite a vacation! How was the Mt Biking?
Thanks for the #rebcny updates about the key points of what people are actually talking about. Keep them coming!
Check out RentEstes.com, or Windcliff.com. VRBO has a lot of good options as well for vacation homes in Estes Park.
Distractions are so bitter sweet. You get caught up in a great blog post or 3 or 10 and then *poof* All your time is gone
I'm guessing thats an email newsletter....if thats the case, then sure, sign me up. I can always use a few more tips
I have a local mort. broker who does a great job. If she can't get the job done (never know these days) I'll let you know.
Let me know what you find. I've been curious to find one also instead of RockYou
Part of my busy-ness lately has been another broker in my office leaving Real Estate. Luckily, I picked up all her clients :)
working on feed reader 0, but got sidetracked with all the great content....must go to bed now or I'll regret it tomorrow. G'night everyone
My 3 old son just asked for Broccoli as a snack before bedtime. Where in the world did that come from?
Did I mention there are some great hits and a lot of big plays? Check out the NFL video http://budurl.com/qxmr
Any NFL football fans out there? Check out this video by NFL Films. Awesome recap of the year. Turn up the volume! http://budurl.com/qxmr
Hello Everyone! Getting back in the saddle again after a busy holiday season and being sick for the last few days. My to-do list is HUGE.
I feel like someone is standing on my forehead. Being sick really stinks - especially for new years!
